rows.label: tev001693_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey, [ST:playername ]!
I was just checking out your pup here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0002
rows.name: I can't believe how real it seems![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0003
rows.name:
It's warm, and has bushy fur, and it feels really
good to pet. And when you step on its tail,
it barks and bites you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0004
rows.name: This is some incredible A.I.![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0005
rows.name:
Yep. Real cutting-edge technology...
It's almost in the same league as Skells![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0006
rows.name: Whoa, wait. What if we put this A.I. INTO Skells?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_JNK0010
rows.name: Interrupt

rows.label: tev001693_SEL0011
rows.name: Nip Alexa's absurd idea in the bud.

rows.label: tev001693_JNK0020
rows.name: Propose

rows.label: tev001693_SEL0021
rows.name:
Suggest that Alexa take the idea
to an arms manufacturer.

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0007
rows.name: Oh, sorry! I just did it again, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0008
rows.name:
Tika's on me about this all the time, you know?
She says I'm only allowed to bring up the topic of
Skells five times per day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0009
rows.name:
Sometimes even I'M surprised about how obsessed I am
with the little buggers![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0010
rows.name:
Back on Earth, I was just a normal military cadet who
spent her time studying behavioral sciences.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0011
rows.name: Wait, whaaaat? You actually LIKE my idea?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0012
rows.name:
Well, hot damn! I'm glad SOMEONE does!
I know Tika would just shoot it right down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0013
rows.name:
When I suggested a while ago that we stop producing
cars for New LA and focus on civilian Skells instead,
she actually slapped me. In the face![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0014
rows.name:
And THEN she said she was saving the backhand
return-slap for my next stupid idea![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0015
rows.name:
It wasn't always like this. Back on Earth, I was just a
normal military cadet studying behavioral sciences.
Who'd have thought I'd become such a Skell fanatic?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_JNK0030
rows.name: Express Shock

rows.label: tev001693_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Alexa that her past surprises you.

rows.label: tev001693_JNK0040
rows.name: Express Admiration

rows.label: tev001693_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Alexa that you're proud she's come so far.

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0016
rows.name: Really? You didn't know that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0017
rows.name:
Yeah, my mom wanted me to go into a military
academy straight out of high school.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0018
rows.name:
I wasn't all that excited about it, but I was a pretty
docile kid. I basically went along because I knew it
would make her happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0019
rows.name:
And before I even knew what was happening,
I found myself stationed on the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0020
rows.name: I never even rode in a Skell before I arrived on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0021
rows.name: Oh, but I'm leaving out all the best parts![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0022
rows.name:
I want to tell you the long version of my story,
and I want to hear yours, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0023
rows.name:
But we'd better put a cork in this for now.
Catch you later![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0024
rows.name:
I guess it has been a pretty long road, huh?
I mean, there were Skells back on Earth,
but I never had a chance to ride in one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0025
rows.name:
And I wasn't exactly diligent about staying on top
of my combat training.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0026
rows.name:
That was back then, though. Since we arrived here,
I've been working really hard at it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0027
rows.name: Mostly because of how badly I wanted to pilot a Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0028
rows.name: But that's a story for another day. Let's chat later![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0029
rows.name:
I want to tell you the rest of my background,
and also hear about what you did back on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001693_MSG0030
rows.name: Soâ€”to be continued. Catch you later![ST:wait ]
